scripts.build: npm install && (if [ -L node_modules/@libs/domain ] || [ ! -d node_modules/@libs/domain/src ]; then rm -rf node_modules/@libs/domain && mkdir -p node_modules/@libs/domain && cp -r ../../libs/domain/src node_modules/@libs/domain/ && cp ../../libs/domain/package.json node_modules/@libs/domain/; fi) && tsc -p tsconfig.json && tsc-alias -p tsconfig.json
scripts.package: npm run build && npm install --production && zip -r function.zip dist node_modules/@libs/domain node_modules/@aws-sdk node_modules/aws-lambda node_modules/crypto
